```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# R-Markdown Options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, cache = TRUE)
# Dependencies
library(data.table)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r data}
acc_ebit_01 <- readRDS("../acc_ebit_01.rds")
acc_ni_01 <- readRDS("../acc_ni_01.rds")
acc_eps_01 <- readRDS("../acc_eps_01.rds")

str_point_acc <- c("smape", "rank_smape", "mase", "rank_mase")
str_dist_acc <- c("smis", "rank_smis", "acd", "rank_acd")

# Mean (Overall)
acc_point <- data.table::dcast(
  data.table::rbindlist(list(acc_ebit_01, acc_ni_01, acc_eps_01), idcol = "id"),
  id + type ~ h,
  fun = mean,
  value.var = str_point_acc
)
acc_point[
  , paste0(c("smape", "rank_smape", "mase", "rank_mase"), "_rk") := lapply(
    .SD, data.table::frank, ties.method = "min"), 
  .SDcols = patterns("Total"), 
  by = c("id")
]

acc_dist <- data.table::dcast(
  data.table::rbindlist(list(acc_ebit_01, acc_ni_01, acc_eps_01), idcol = "id"),
  id + type ~ h,
  fun = mean,
  value.var = str_dist_acc
)
acc_dist[
  , paste0(c("smis", "rank_smis", "acd", "rank_acd"), "_rk") := lapply(
    .SD, data.table::frank, ties.method = "min"), 
  .SDcols = patterns("Total"), 
  by = c("id")
]
```

### Mean Metrics
```{r stat_pf}
n_id <- nrow(acc_point) / length(unique(acc_point$id))
DT_kable <- acc_point[, .SD, .SDcols = -patterns("id|rank")]
data.table::setcolorder(DT_kable, c(
  "type", "smape_Q1", "smape_Q1 - Q4", "smape_Q5 - Q6", "smape_Total", "smape_rk",
  "mase_Q1", "mase_Q1 - Q4", "mase_Q5 - Q6", "mase_Total", "mase_rk"
))

knitr::kable(
  DT_kable,
  format = "latex",
  booktabs = TRUE,
  digits = 1,
  caption = "Forecasting performance achieved per forecasting horizon - Point Forecasts",
  label = "stat_pf",
  linesep = "",
  format.args = list(big.mark = ","),
  col.names = kableExtra::linebreak(
    c("", rep(c("Quarter\n(1)", "Year\n(1-4)", "Long\n(5-6)", "Total\n(1-6)", "Rank"), 2)), 
    align = "c"
  ),
  escape = FALSE
) %>%
  # kableExtra::kable_styling(font_size = 10, latex_options = c("scale_down")) %>%
  kableExtra::add_header_above(c("", "Mean sMAPE" = 5, "Mean MASE" = 5)) %>%
  kableExtra::group_rows(index = c("EBIT" = n_id, "Net Income" = n_id, "EPS" = n_id))
```
